        <script type="text/javascript">
            //倒计时程序
            function countdown(year, month, day){
                var targetTime = new Date(year,month-1,day);
                var currentTime = new Date();
                var timeLength = targetTime - currentTime;
                var day = Math.floor(timeLength/1000/86400);
                var hour = Math.floor(timeLength/1000%86400/3600);
                if(timeLength < 0){
                  day = 0;
                  hour = 0;
                }

                countdown.move = function(num,selector){
                    //计算和当前数值差距
                    var curNode = selector.find("li")[0];
                    cumNum = parseInt($(curNode).data("num"));
                    var nodeList = [cumNum];
                    while(cumNum != num){
                        if(cumNum == 0)cumNum=10;
                        cumNum -= 1;
                        nodeList.push(cumNum);
                    }
                    //插入节点
                    for(var i=1;i<nodeList.length;i++){
                        selector.append("<li data-num='"+nodeList[i]+"'>"+nodeList[i]+"</li>");    
                    }
                    //开始动画
                    selector.css({top:"0px"});
                    selector.animate({
                        top:-selector.height() + selector.height()/nodeList.length,
                    },2000,function(){
                        //删除无用节点
                        selector.find("li").remove();
                        selector.append("<li data-num='"+num+"'>"+num+"</li>");
                        selector.css({top:"0px"});
                    })
                    
                }

                if(day>= 2 && day <10){
                    $(".mobile-pia-container .count-down .container").addClass("twoday");
                }

                if(day >= 2){
                    countdown.move(Math.floor(day/10),$(".mobile-pia-container .count-down .container.shiwei"));
                    countdown.move(Math.floor(day%10),$(".mobile-pia-container .count-down .container.gewei"));
                }

                if(day <2){
                    $(".mobile-pia-container .count-down .container").addClass("h48");
                    hour += day*24;
                    countdown.move(Math.floor(hour/10),$(".mobile-pia-container .count-down .container.shiwei"));
                    countdown.move(Math.floor(hour%10),$(".mobile-pia-container .count-down .container.gewei"));
                    $(".mobile-pia-container .time-unit").html("小时，");
                }
            }

                  msize = size.substring(size.indexOf(":")+2,size.indexOf("px"));
